DECLARE @CommunityId_ca varchar(8) DECLARE @JobNumber_ca varchar(8)
SELECT @CommunityId_ca = job.CommunityId, @JobNumber_ca = job.JobNumber FROM vJobSaleLookup vjsl INNER JOIN JOB_Jobs job ON vjsl.JobNumber = job.JobNumber WHERE vjsl.SaleId = :SaleId
exec COM_Assemblies_sel @CommunityId = @CommunityId_ca
